result.eng: Which would you prefer, tea or coffee?

result.eng: Which route would you choose for the new train line?
result.ga: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nua

result.ga: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh tú

result.eng: Which of my friends will get an invitation?

result.eng: They walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ga: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.orig: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.html: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teachtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ponchtml: Ṡiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raiḃ siad tar éis teaċtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.

result.eng: Doctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ga: Tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.orig: Tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.html: Tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ponchtml: Tugann doċtúirí cógas dóiḃ a ṫugann faoiseaṁ dóiḃ aċ naċ leiġeasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.

result.html: Cé acu ceannWhich one?

result.eng: Which of you is older, you or Siobhán?

result.eng: A light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ga: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.orig: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.html: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíochtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a ċuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faoḃar ar a cruṫaíoċtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.

result.eng: I was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.orig: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.html: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romhamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag réitiú do mo ḃainis naċ raiḃ aċ aon lá déag roṁamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
